Text: My doctor prescribed metformin to help control my type 2 diabetes.
Taking aspirin for my headache pain.
Lisinopril is great for treating high blood pressure.
Omeprazole helps with my acid reflux symptoms.
Using albuterol inhaler for my asthma attacks.
Levothyroxine treats my hypothyroidism effectively.
Doctor put me on atorvastatin to lower my cholesterol.
Amoxicillin cleared up my bacterial sinus infection.
Taking acetaminophen (Tylenol) to reduce my fever.
Ibuprofen helps with inflammation from my arthritis.
Fluoxetine has been effective for treating my depression.
Sertraline helps manage my anxiety disorder.
Loratadine (Claritin) works well for my seasonal allergies.
Ondansetron prevents nausea during my chemotherapy treatments.
Montelukast helps control my asthma symptoms.
Metoprolol succinate is used to treat my heart failure.
Prednisone reduces inflammation from my autoimmune condition.
Gabapentin treats the nerve pain from my diabetic neuropathy.
Tamsulosin helps with urinary symptoms from BPH.
Hydrochlorothiazide controls my high blood pressure.
Warfarin prevents blood clots after my heart valve replacement.
